casename: Asia-Pacific Ventures II Ltd and Others v PT Intimutiara Gasindo and Others
counsel: Molly Lim SC and Roland Tong (Wong Tan & Molly Lim ) for the appellants/defendants; Chong Boon Leong and Edric Pan (Rajah & Tann ) for the respondents/plaintiffs
tags-parsed: Conflict of Laws/Natural forum/Stay of proceedings/Dispute pertaining to agreement governed by Singapore law and providing for non-exclusive jurisdiction of Singapore courts/Contracting parties having no connection with Singapore/Defendants Indonesian companies or citizens/Concurrent proceedings in Indonesia/Whether Singapore more appropriate forum than Indonesia/Relevant consideration in granting stay/Whether justice requires that plaintiffs be permitted to proceed with action in Singapore
